phase.text: Thank goodness help is finally here! My name is Lia. Are you here to rescue us?

userResponse.option: Don’t worry, Lia. I’ll have you out in a jiffy!

phase.text: Listen, I have something that might help you.

userResponse.option: You have a pair of bolt cutters?
I thought a tissue might suffice!

phase.text: I built a gadget that might be able to get us out of here, and I just happened to have it with me!

userResponse.option: Well, tell me where I can find it!
I hope it’s not in that web with you. I’ll never get you out if it is!

phase.text: It's hidden over there... inside the claw machine.
I heard those thugs coming! I didn’t want them getting a hold of it.

userResponse.option: Now how am I supposed to get in there?
Do you have any idea how to get the gadget out?

phase.text: The floor looks shaky under that vending machine on the back wall.
Trust me, try filling up the vending machine with water, it should do something to help!
Well done! Now load my new super water gun and shoot the web!
phase.textOnReturn: Great agent. Now please cut the me down!
